CatDescriptText: Herman Slome, owner, Pure Drug Co., was part of the Pittsburgher's Speak Up column published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, September 5, 1959, with question: "Do you believe Allegheny County Democrats and Republicans have selected their best candidates for public offices in past 10 years?" Answer reads: "I am not well informed about local politics. My interest centers on the national picture, especially segregation.  I think Gov. Lawrence is an able politician, very aggressive, and as good as any the Democrats could have selected."
TitMainTitle: Portrait of Herman Slome wearing eyeglasses and dark striped shirt, standing at counter in Pure Drug Company, 2178 Centre Avenue, Hill District
